// ********** THERMOMETER STUFF ********** //

/* Zero Lines
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
/*

uint8_t zero_lines = {0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00}

/* One Line
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
11111111
/*

uint8_t one_line = {0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0xFF}


/* Two Lines
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
11111111
11111111
*/

uint8_t two_lines = {0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0xFF, 0xFF}


/* Three Lines
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
11111111
11111111
11111111
*/

uint8_t three_lines = {0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF}


/* Four Lines
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
*/

uint8_t four_lines = {0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF}


/* Five Lines
00000000
00000000
00000000
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
*/

uint8_t five_lines = {0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF}


/* Six Lines
00000000
00000000
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
*/

uint8_t six_lines = {0x00, 0x00, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF}


/* Seven Lines
00000000
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
*/

uint8_t seven_lines = {0x00, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF}

/* Eight Lines
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
11111111
*/

uint8_t eight_lines = {0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF}
